name: Falcom Classics
details: Sega Saturn VCD card compatible game - behind the scenes footage is much higher quality with more frames

name: Gungriffon
details: Sega Saturn VCD card compatible game - Japanese version uses card for better quality FMV

name: Lunar: Silver Star Story Complete
details: Sega Saturn VCD card required - used for all video cut scenes

name: Moon Cradle
details: Sega Saturn VCD card compatible game - improves quality of FMV

name: Sentimental Graffiti
details: Sega Saturn VCD card compatible game - comes with 2nd disc called 'Second Window' that uses VCD card for anime video opening

name: Vatlva
details: Sega Saturn VCD card compatible game - using VCD card makes FMV scenes larger and better quality

name: Wangan Dead Heat + Real Arrange
details: Sega Saturn VCD card compatible game - VCD card makes FMV look MUCH better (Highway 2000 outside of Japan does not use VCD)
